sentences.english: Fare well, Ai Iijima, I'll remember your love forever.
sentences.chinese: 永別了，飯島愛，我永遠會記得妳的愛。

sentences.english: Surrender to shine with this shimmering coral-pink.
sentences.chinese: 我願臣服在妳的珠光珊瑚色裙襬下。

sentences.english: My spirit and soul, keep waiting in your heart the door.
sentences.chinese: 我的靈和魂魄，不停守候在妳心門口。

sentences.english: I kind of broke the rules when I photocopied your file.
sentences.chinese: 我影印妳的檔案多少是違反規定的。

sentences.english: Can you spell mousetrap with three letters ?
sentences.chinese: 妳能拼出三個字母的捕鼠器嗎？

sentences.english: Oh-hoo-ha-hoo-ha-hoo-ha! Oh, well-a, that my love-a was just for you, hoo-hoo, only you.
sentences.chinese: 哦，嗯，我必須要告訴妳我當時只愛妳一個人。

sentences.english: Oh-hoo-ha-hoo-ha-hoo-ha! Oh, well-a, that my love-a was just for you, hoo-hoo, only you.
sentences.chinese: 哦，嗯，我必須要告訴妳我當時只愛妳一個人。

sentences.english: If I can have you to myself, I promise I'll be faithful.
sentences.chinese: 如果我能得到妳，我答應妳我會專情。

sentences.english: If I can have you to myself, I promise I'll be faithful.
sentences.chinese: 如果我能得到妳，我答應妳我會專情。

sentences.english: Press the amount you have to pay, insert your coins, and the ticket will come out.
sentences.chinese: 按下妳要買的票價，投入零錢，票就會跑出來了。

sentences.english: You protest against the family, has led to self-injury.
sentences.chinese: 妳抗議家人，卻導致自己受傷。

sentences.english: Doesn't Lee remind you of someone?
sentences.chinese: 李沒有讓妳想起某人嗎？

sentences.english: Wish you a Marry Christmas and Happy New Year.
sentences.chinese: 謝謝，也祝妳聖誔節快樂，新年蒙褔。

sentences.english: I suggest that you should talk to a professional counselor at your university.
sentences.chinese: 我建議妳跟大學裏的職業輔導員相談一下。

sentences.english: All right, please give me one wax apple.
Never give up of your decision since only one cauce .
sentences.chinese: 不要只因一次挫敗，就放棄妳原來決心達到的目的。

definition: to request sb to do sth/please!
variant of 怎麼|怎么[zen3 me5]
variant of 那麼|那么[na4 me5]
sentence-final particle (abbr. for 呢啊[ne5 a5] or variant of 哪[na5])
variant of 這麼|这么[zhe4 me5]
final particle expressing exhortation, admiration etc
to worry/to feel anxious/Taiwan pr. [zhao1 ji2]
oh (expression of agreement or surprise)/(Cantonese) not
suffix, used to form interrogative 什麼|什么[shen2 me5], what?, indefinite 這麼|这么[zhe4 me5] thus, etc
